page.title: 06FORENSIC LABORATORY
page.content: The present lab was completed in 1973 and opened in the summer months of that year. Prior to this Forensic work was done in Verner St.(markets area) of Belfast, and before that at Preston,Lancashire. Forensic Science entails: (1) The scientific examination of exhibits seized by Police officers in connection with their enquires. (2) Examination of some scenes of crime,sudden death and road traffic accidents Total staff compliment: 142 people 85 of whom are scientists. The examination on weapons is extremely extensive. The lab is larger than those inScotland and Dublin.The success rate ismeasured by questionaires. Total case intake for 1984 was roughly 8000
